channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description:
@DBashIdeas @HeliasHebreus Ha. I took a Renaissance and Reformation history course as a YU undergrad. Write a paper about how this issue played out in Prague circa 1500. (There was some defenestration involved.)

@DBashIdeas @HeliasHebreus My paper lost points for being too focused on the underlying lomdus.
item.source:markdown:
@DBashIdeas @HeliasHebreus Ha. I took a Renaissance and Reformation history course as a YU undergrad. Write a paper about how this issue played out in Prague circa 1500. (There was some defenestration involved.)
@DBashIdeas @HeliasHebreus My paper lost points for being too focused on the underlying lomdus.

item.description: Presumably Orson Scott Card or Larry Niven would be the first scifi authors to license their dna for cultured meat. https://t.co/YY28j09Y6c

item.description: @quamona_rimby Luckily, since we’re all bnei nivi’im, verification isn’t necessary.
item.source:markdown: @quamona_rimby Luckily, since we’re all bnei nivi’im, verification isn’t necessary.

item.description: @quamona_rimby I see a Horowitz. Are you related to the Shl'ah?
item.source:markdown: @quamona_rimby I see a Horowitz. Are you related to the Shl'ah?

item.description: Honest, we don't require a pedigree from our authors. https://t.co/nNtvDHG1Ic

item.description: @MisfitTorah Not sure what his position would be on yelling Shabbos at a street theatre….

item.description: @Shmarya Won’t someone think of the Torah that won’t be learned for Nine Days siyummim in the post-meat world?
item.source:markdown: @Shmarya Won’t someone think of the Torah that won’t be learned for Nine Days siyummim in the post-meat world?

item.description:
@MisfitTorah I bet the legislator in question doesn’t consider herself controversial.

@MisfitTorah Also, non-legislators should also be conscious of OpSec in such matters.
